The sink outside the cafeteria has four taps, and a tray for soap. A (single) training was held in the past by the Ayder Referral Hospital to provide soaps and basic hygiene training.

Students use the taps to wash their faces, hands and hair, and for drinking water - particularly prior to installation of sinks outside of bathroom. Some of the smaller children appear to have trouble reaching the taps.
The flow is not very strong and is dependent on the city water supply.
The cooks have requested a sink for inside the cafeteria.
